basic_socket_acceptor::basic_socket_acceptor

    asio::io_service & io_service);

    asio::io_service & io_service,

    asio::io_service & io_service,

    typename SocketAcceptorService1>

    basic_socket_acceptor< Protocol1, SocketAcceptorService1 > && other,
